root.name: Touhou 13.5 - Hopeless Masquerade
root.description: Not much is known about the story or character roster at this time, but it seems that it will involve representatives of three main religions (Shinto, Buddhism, and Taoism) fighting each other to gain adherents.A demo version of the game was released at Comiket 83 on December 30th, 2012. The full version will be released at Reitaisai 10 on May 26th.Playable CharactersReimu HakureiMarisa KirisameIchirin KumoiByakuren HijiriMononobe no FutoToyosatomimi no MikoNitori KawashiroKoishi KomeijiMamizou Futatsuiwa
